select trade_post_SEQ.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO trade_post(trade_post_no,title,content,regdate, price,id,category_no,board_type_no) VALUES (trade_post_SEQ.currval,#{title},#{content},sysdate,#{price}, #{memberVO.id},#{categoryNo},#{boardTypeNo})
mapper.select: SELECT tp.trade_post_no , tp.title , tp.category_no , tp.board_type_no , tp.price , bm.name , tp.imgAddress , tp.regdate , tp.id FROM ( SELECT row_number() over(ORDER BY t.trade_post_no DESC) AS rnum , t.id , t.trade_post_no , t.title , t.price , t.category_no , t.board_type_no , to_char(t.regdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')as regdate , p.photo_path AS imgAddress FROM trade_post t, photo p WHERE t.board_type_no=#{board_type_no} AND t.trade_post_no= p.trade_post_no AND t.category_no=#{category_no} AND t.delete_status=0 )tp , bay_member bm WHERE tp.id=bm.id AND rnum BETWEEN #{pagingBean.startRowNumber} AND #{pagingBean.endRowNumber} ORDER BY trade_post_no DESC

SELECT tp.trade_post_no, tp.category_no, tp.title, tp.content, tp.suggest_content, tp.board_type_no, tp.regdate,tp.pick_count, tp.price, tp.id, bm.name, ts.status, mg.grade, tp.trade_id FROM trade_post tp, bay_member bm, trade_status ts, member_grade mg WHERE tp.id=bm.id AND tp.trade_status_no=ts.trade_status_no AND tp.trade_post_no=#{value} AND bm.member_grade_no=mg.member_grade_no
mapper.update: UPDATE trade_post SET delete_status=1 WHERE trade_post_no=#{value}
UPDATE trade_post SET trade_id=#{tradeId}, trade_status_no=trade_status_no+1 WHERE trade_post_no=#{tradePostNo}
UPDATE trade_post SET trade_id=NULL, trade_status_no=1, suggest_content=NULL WHERE trade_post_no=#{tradePostNo}
mapper.select: SELECT tp.trade_post_no , tp.title , tp.price , tp.board_type_no , bm.name , tp.imgAddress , tp.regdate FROM ( SELECT row_number() over(ORDER BY t.trade_post_no DESC) AS rnum , t.id , t.trade_post_no , t.title , t.price , t.board_type_no , to_char(t.regdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')as regdate , p.photo_path AS imgAddress FROM trade_post t, photo p WHERE t.trade_post_no= p.trade_post_no AND t.delete_status=0 )tp , bay_member bm WHERE tp.id=bm.id AND rnum <= 3 ORDER BY trade_post_no DESC
